body:
Currently it is not possible to select such a "card" (eg. Markov's Servant) if using Magarena's deck editor to construct the deck. However, it is still possible to add it outside of Magarena by updating the "dec" file directly. When parsing the "dec" file need to check for this and flag the deck as invalid if found.

Initially raised by Aswan jaguar in forum at http://www.slightlymagic.net/forum/viewtopic.php?f=82&t=3735&p=159485&sid=9076b997f03fadc85c5fec41d38f2279#p159476 .
